channel.title: Iis on Ian Carnaghan
channel.description: Recent content in Iis on Ian Carnaghan

item.title: Coldfusion 9 and IIS
item.description: I have been developing in ColdFusion for a while locally using the built in web server. Recently at work several of the projects I am involved with moved to an IIS production server. In order to test fully in my local environment I needed to install IIS and setup ColdFusion to use it as the server instead of its built in version.
